page.title: 10HOUSING (b)
page.content: There is some development of council estates taking place at the moment around Pleasley. It was revealed that first time house buyers, mainly young couples , tended to go for the terraced two bedroomed houses as a "stepping stone" to a detached house with a garage. In order to be in keeping with the environment several new houses had to be built in natural stone to blend in with the village church and other older buildings,so they did not look out of place and blended in with the surroundings.
